resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108155</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108155</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202557</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Holiday Shopper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feiertag-Käufer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Client de Vacances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cliente Do Feriado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cliente Di Festa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγοραστής διακοπών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprador Del Día de fiesta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This activity uses a prepared spreadsheet and the grocery sales paper from the newspaper to figure the cost of a holiday meal for a certain number of people.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität benutzt eine vorbereitete 
Kalkulationstabelle und das Lebensmittelgeschäftverkäufe Papier von 
der Zeitung, um die Kosten einer Feiertagmahlzeit für eine bestimmte 
Anzahl von Leuten darzustellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité emploie un tableur préparé et le
papier de ventes d'épicerie du journal pour figurer le coût d'un 
repas de vacances pour un certain nombre de personnes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade usa um spreadsheet preparado e o 
papel das vendas do mantimento do jornal figurar o custo de uma 
refeição do feriado para um determinado número dos povos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività usa un foglio elettronico 
preparato e la carta da vendite della drogheria dal giornale per 
calcolare il costo di un pasto di festa per un determinato numero di 
gente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα χρησιμοποιεί έναν έτοιμο 
υπολογισμό με λογιστικό φύλλο (spreadsheet) και το έγγραφο 
πωλήσεων παντοπωλείων από την εφημερίδα για να λογαριάσει το 
κόστος ενός γεύματος διακοπών για ορισμένους ανθρώπους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta actividad utiliza una hoja de balance 
preparada y el papel de las ventas de la tienda de comestibles del 
periódico para calcular el coste de una comida del día de fiesta 
para cierto número de la gente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:STEPHANIE HURLEY
FN:STEPHANIE HURLEY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202557</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108155</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/holiday-shopper</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
